text: “Aron ofa gamir gumazimɨn otivsɨ, nɨ sipsipɨn evarir tuzim uan dafarimɨn an suiragh a fegh a damutɨ a nan damazimɨn ighuavamangɨ. Egh Aronɨn otariba bagh sipsipɨn buarakɨrir agharir guvimɨn itim inigh uan dafarimɨn an suiragh a fegh a damutɨ a nan damazimɨn ighuavamangɨ. Arazir kamɨn, nɨ ofa gamir gumazibar ikɨsɨ me amɨsefegh. Egh gɨn ia asɨzir tuzir kam isɨ ofa gamir gumazibar anɨngightɨ, me aneremɨ.
